titleInfo.title: DISASTER TAX RELIEF AND AIRPORT AND AIRWAY EXTENSION ACT OF 2017

extension.searchTitle: DISASTER TAX RELIEF AND AIRPORT AND AIRWAY EXTENSION ACT OF 2017; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 156

congVote.result: So the motion to recommit was rejected.

congVote.dailyDigestCategory1: Disaster Tax Relief and Airport and Airway Extension Act of 2017
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House passed H.R. 3823, to amend title 49, United States Code, to extend authorizations for the airport improvement program, to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the funding and expenditure authority of the Airport and Airway Trust Fund, and to provide disaster tax relief, by a yea-and-nay vote of 264 yeas to 155 nays, Roll No. 542. Consideration began yesterday, September 27th.

titleInfo.title: CONTROL UNLAWFUL FUGITIVE FELONS ACT OF 2017

extension.searchTitle: CONTROL UNLAWFUL FUGITIVE FELONS ACT OF 2017; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 156

congVote.dailyDigestCategory1: Control Unlawful Fugitive Felons Act of 2017
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House passed H.R. 2792, to amend the Social Security Act to make certain revisions to provisions limiting payment of benefits to fugitive felons under titles II, VIII, and XVI of the Social Security Act, by a yea-and-nay vote of 244 yeas to 171 nays, Roll No. 543.
